column3: School of Art, Design and Performance
column5: OverviewComputer animation is used across so many creative industries, from computer games and advertising, to television and film. If you're ready to learn the skills you need to work in the exciting computer animation industry – and take your education to the next level too – this is the Master's course for you.On this MSc Computer Animation degree, you'll develop technical skills, learn to use the latest kit, and put your expertise into practice as you take on a computer animation project that matches your interests and career ambitions.When you graduate, you'll have all the tools you need for a career in the creative and media industries.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
